data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Bargarh hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bargarh, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 16,294 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 16,294 believers in the county of Bargarh into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Bargarh, Odisha, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Solaha people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Solaha people know you.
Father, help the 16,294 believers in Bargarh to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,481,300 people living in the county of Bargarh.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bargarh, Odisha, India has a population of 1,481,300.

We estimate Bargarh has 16,294 people who might know Jesus, 17,973 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,447,033 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Bargarh, Odisha, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.
